sys_ux_client_script.name: Refresh landing

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_749513e47d607110c65074e81cea2311
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">3c9513e46e607110b9d06f8a402ca11f</macroponent><name>Refresh landing</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    if(event.payload.name !== 'refresh'){
        return;
    }
    api.data.evam_mytasks.refresh();
    api.data.evam_myrequests.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_1.refresh();
    api.data.hide_content_sets_2.refresh();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>749513e47d607110c65074e81cea2311</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_749513e47d607110c65074e81cea2311</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:01</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
